name: Ahri Cosplay ❀˖° (LoRA)
description:
Hiii ໒꒰ྀི´ ˘ ` ꒱ྀིづ !! So this is a bit different then what I usually do but I wanted to try out making clothing/cosplay Loras ! This is my first attempt so please let me know if there's any issues !

My intended purpose of this Lora is to let any character or person you want cosplay as Ahri !! <3

I used ChillOutMix and a mix of Realistic Vision and ChillOutMix for the examples !!₍ᐢ. .ᐢ₎

Please use negative prompt Embedding (Easy Negative) it works a lot better with it then without it !! I've noticed many issues with odd hands as well so you can also use Bad-Hands-5 !!

I recommend keeping the weight at (1-0.7) and using the negative prompts as needed !!

I also highly recommend using the inpaint face trick to fix the faces !!

use trigger words (White Tails, Black long hair, yellow eyes) if your having trouble getting all her features and clothing ! Ive also noticed in a few ocasions the dress will become white so use (red dress) if you come across this issue !!

This Lora also works kind of well in combination with other Lora's ! you may have to lower the strength of my Lora if you wanna get the full likeness of the specific person !!

I used a ton of the KPOP loras from this creator noriko_takeda they work great in combination with this my Lora !!

Please be kind with this Lora ♡

modelVersions.name: ahri_Cosplay_V1
trainedWords: White Tails, Black long hair, yellow eyes
modelVersions.description:
I highly recommend using the trigger word Ahri_Cosplay.

I recommend keeping the weight at (1-0.7) and using the negative prompts as needed !!

I used ChillOutMix and a mix I made of Realistic Vision and ChillOutMix for the examples !!₍ᐢ. .ᐢ₎

Please use negative prompt Embedding (Easy Negative) it works a lot better with it then without it !! I've noticed many issues with odd hands as well so you can also use Bad-Hands-5 !!

use trigger words (White Tails, Black long hair, yellow eyes) if your having trouble getting all her features and clothing ! I've also noticed in a few occasions the dress will become white so use (red dress) if you come across this issue !!

I also highly recommend using the inpaint face trick to fix the faces !!

Here are all the settings used for most the examples:

Size: 512x512

Denoising strength: 0.45

Clip skip: 2

Hires upscale: 2

Hires upscaler: ESRGAN_4x

If you have any issues please tell me and ill try and help !! ૮₍ ˶ᵔ ᵕ ᵔ˶ ₎ა
